articles.description: It’s not always practical, but Samsung’s 3D gaming monitor makes me want to believe in the future of 3D displays.
articles.content: The setup is fairly simple, though it requires a few things to get started. First off, you need the Reality Hub app launcher to actually play games in 3D. It's too bad it requires a separate app, but… [+1805 chars]

articles.title: The creator of The Witcher 3 HD Reworked has released his first mods for Oblivion Remastered - DSOGaming
articles.description: Modder 'Halk Hogan', known for his HD Reworked Projects for The Witcher 3, has released his first mods for Oblivion Remastered.
articles.content:
Modder ‘Halk Hogan’, known for his HD Reworked Projects for The Witcher 3 and Cyberpunk 2077, has released his first mods for Oblivion Remastered. So, let’s take a closer look at them, shall we?
